short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make favicons for the modern web. Includes icons for Android, iOS and Windows 8.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Favicon Generator helps you make icons for the web modern web easily and effortlessly. You can drag-and-drop, upload or paste images and it will make icons for you.

You get one .ico file for the desktop browser which includes four sizes. 16, 32, 48 and 64. All in one file for the best responsive favicon you can get.

You also get icons sized perfectly for the Android devices, iOS devices and even Windows 8 apps. So when someone bookmarks or adds your site to the homescreen, they get to see your icon!

Also included is a .html file so you won't have to go through the effort of writing the metadata and a .jade file for people who use Jade.

And all this, in one zip file, created in seconds!

Features:
* Drag-And-Drop
* Copy and Paste
* One zip file
* .ico file with four sizes
* 10 .png images in various sizes
* A HTML template to get you started
* A Jade template for Jade users.
* Fast and easy
